subject: Order SSN3061
description_text:
Hi,

I placed an order on 23rd October which I am still waiting to arrive. I've had 2 tracking numbers from 'SF'

SF6045986860972
SF6045986860945

Both of them cannot be found on SF website.

I also had 1 tracking number from 'Evri' which came on 24th October. This has been stuck ever since and not changed. I have also reached out for further support from Evri.

H01SRA0034612475

I would appreciate any assistance if possible,

Thank you,
Maxim Zotov
https://proton.me/mail/home

conversations.body_text: Hi RIPSAW,    We apologize for any inconvenience caused. Here is your logistics tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045986860972,SF6045986860945
